SageTVPlugin.Name: sagex-services - SageTV Remote API Services
SageTVPlugin.Description: HTTP and RMI services for SageTV (HTTP services require Jetty Plugin). HTTP services includes JSON/JSONP and Xml formats.
SageTVPlugin.Author: stuckless
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
7.1.9.10 * fixed Map serialization error
7.1.8 * API Refresh
7.0.23.9 * Now depends on .9 (which is required in order for the startup to work correctly)
7.0.23.8 * Fixed startup bug that caused sagex api to fail since .7
7.0.23.7 * HTTP Services are password protected by default (can be turned off in the Plugin Configuration)
7.0.23.2 * Deprecated legacy xml, json, xbmc, and java remote interfaces * Added RMI Reaper for cleaning up Remote RMI objects
7.0.21 * Added 404 when images are not found * Merged broconne's Music Image media handler patch
